content: this timeless beret is crocheted in the round from the crown downward to the brim the unique texture of aurelie really shines in this project and the best part it s quick enough to make in an afternoon skills/techniques used in this pattern single and half_double_crochet stitches magic_ring working in the round in a spiral increasing and decreasing finished measurements brim circumference 16 stretches to 22 depth 7 5 hooks & notions us size m/n 13 9 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle removable stitch marker elle by me is a contemporary line of yarns designed to empower creative expression and celebrate individuality we believe that luxury is a matter of style rather than money elevate your projects using elle by me s exquisite textures runway-inspired color palettes and unrivaled quality - all available at inclusive price points unleash your inner designer and craft elle-worthy masterpieces that seamlessly blend haute couture with handmade charm with elle by me
